Class EMFCompareDiffTreeRuler

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget

org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
org.eclipse.emf.compare.ide.ui.internal.structuremergeviewer.EMFCompareDiffTreeRuler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
public class EMFCompareDiffTreeRuler extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Canvas
A specific canvas that must be presented next to a TreeViewer. It shows consequences of a Diff (required and unmergeable differences), as in the TreeViewer, but in a compact format (small colored rectangles) and with links to respectives Treeitems.
